column5: need some help for some reason I can't upload photos everytime I do it tells me I didn't choose a file to upload when I did choose one can anyone help me out
Are you trying to upload it as an attachment?  Or is it for the gallery?  Attachments have a max file size of 250K
how can I down size them then so they are 250 never tried posting photos before
Join  http://register.photobucket.com/, it's sooooooo much easier!!!
yea I suggest opening an account at photobucket.  You can upload any photo you want there and there are links to embed them in to forums.
I agree photobucket is the way to go.  And when you have a lot of photo's the slide show is awesome
You can try this online resizer. Works great and pretty easy.  http://www.resize2mail.com/
Stick with photo bucket it is so much easier.
thanks guys I got it figured out just made the photo to small I'll just have to figre out how to make them bigger from now on
Whens the last time you up loaded a pic?????????And no the DOCKS dont count.LOL  Photobucket all the way.
No sence of humor.LOL  I seen that. I was going to comment about the back ground,but hey,it could of been TO aswell with all the high rising going on..LOL
Careful, or I'll put a hex on ya, something dastardly for downhill skiing, like ripping the crotch outa your pants and having flailing goulies smacking a few snow stumps between your skis.
